publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5418 Murdo Fraser: Black Watch Parades—That the Parliament gives its thanks and gratitude to the soldiers of the Black Watch, 3rd Battalion of the Royal Regiment of Scotland, for their bravery, commitment and dignity during their recent tour in Afghanistan; recognises that thousands of people lined the streets in the Black Watch Homecoming Parades in Aberfeldy, Dundee, Dunfermline, Forfar, Inverness, Kirkcaldy and Perth, underlining the strong support and appreciation that people have for the Black Watch, and believes that the Black Watch is one of the best fighting units in the world today.
